com.appriskgame.strategy

Interface PlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, RandomPlayer

    public interface PlayerStrategy
    This interface defines the player strategy to be used by all the types of players.
    Author:
    Surya

      Reinforcement of armies to the player owned countries
